name: Web Development Workshop
details: This workshop is designed for students who are interested in learning the basics of web development. Topics covered include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
details: In this workshop, students will learn the fundamentals of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, regression and classification.

name: Cybersecurity 101
details: This workshop will introduce students to the basics of cybersecurity, including network security, cryptography, and threat intelligence.

name: Data Visualization with Python
details: This workshop will teach students how to use Python to visualize data and gain insights from it. Topics covered include plotting with Matplotlib and Seaborn, and data exploration.

name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
details: This workshop will provide an overview of cloud computing, including its benefits, types of clouds, and the most popular cloud service providers.

name: Full Stack Development with Node.js
details: In this workshop, students will learn how to build full-stack web applications using Node.js and Express. Topics covered include CRUD operations, authentication and authorization, and deployment.

name: Digital Marketing Workshop
details: This workshop will provide an introduction to digital marketing, including search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, and social media marketing.

name: Game Development with Unity
details: In this workshop, students will learn how to develop games using Unity. Topics covered include the Unity Editor, scripting in C#, and publishing to various platforms.

name: Blockchain Fundamentals
details: This workshop will provide an introduction to blockchain technology, including its history, use cases, and the difference between public and private blockchains.

name: App Development with Flutter
details: In this workshop, students will learn how to build mobile apps using Flutter. Topics covered include the Flutter widget tree, animation, and deployment to the App Store.

name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
details: This workshop will provide an overview of artificial intelligence, including its history, applications, and the difference between narrow and general AI.

name: Product Management Workshop
details: In this workshop, students will learn the basics of product management, including product discovery, product definition, and product launch.

name: Data Science Fundamentals
details: This workshop will provide an introduction to data science, including data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization.

name: Full-Stack Web Development with Node.js
details: In this workshop, students will learn how to build full-stack web applications using Node.js. Topics covered include server-side JavaScript, the Express.js framework, and the MongoDB database.

name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
details: This workshop will provide an overview of cybersecurity, including network security, application security, and data security.

name: Robotics Fundamentals
details: In this workshop, students will learn the basics of robotics, including robot mechanics, electronics, and programming.

name: Virtual Reality Development
details: This workshop will provide an introduction to virtual reality development, including VR hardware, VR software, and VR user experience design.

name: Augmented Reality Development
details: In this workshop, students will learn how to build augmented reality applications, including AR hardware, AR software, and AR user experience design.

name: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
details: This workshop will provide an introduction to artificial intelligence, including machine learning, deep learning, and computer vision.

name: Natural Language Processing Fundamentals
details: In this workshop, students will learn the basics of natural language processing, including text classification, text generation, and sentiment analysis.
